titleStmt.title: The faith by which we are justified, in scripture-sense according to Scripture, opened, explained, and applied, on Rom. 5, I : in six sermons.
titleStmt.author: G. B. (George Bright), d. 1696.

notesStmt.note: "Published as preached with little or no alteration at the desire of some of the hearers."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
